title: CARMIL: Context-Aware Regularization on Multiple Instance Learning models for Whole Slide Images
details: TN Saada, V Di-Proietto, B Schmauch, K Von Loga… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Multiple Instance Learning (MIL) models have proven effective for cancer prognosis from Whole Slide Images. However, the original MIL formulation incorrectly assumes the patches of the same image to be independent, leading to a loss of spatial context …
